BlobsSystem

Class Blob

  • java.lang.Object
    • BlobsSystem.Blob

  • public class Blob
extends java.lang.Object
    A blob is something that interfere with the simulation. A blob is located in a 2D plane by its center.
     

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected boolean applyAttractivity
      Attractivity is a mode in which you can attract something in contact with the blob (using the brush)
      protected boolean applyEraser
      Erase is a mode in which you can erase or remove something in contact with the blob (using the brush)
      protected boolean applyForce
      Force is a mode in which you can "push" something in contact with the blob (using the brush)
      protected double attractiveForce
      Attractive Force of this blob
      protected Brush brush
      A Brush can be attached to a blob in order to interract with environnement
      protected Vector delta
      Difference between the two last blob's position
      protected java.util.List<Vector> deltaList
      List of all delta values since the last call to getMouvements()
      protected double force
      Force of this blob : use to weight delta
      protected Vector position
      Blob's last center coordinate scaled into ParticlesSystem.ENGINE_X
      protected java.util.List<Vector> positionList
      List of all positions since the last call to getMouvements()
      protected Vector threshold
      Threshold to determine if movement is significant and not to much between to iterations.
      protected int toAdd
      Add permits to add toAdd of something each time the blob appears.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Blob()
      Default constructor : construct a blob initialized at (0,0)
      Blob(Vector position)
      Construct a blob from normalized coordinates

      Get the toAdd value

      Move a blob to a new position

      Set the toAdd value

      Set the brush

    • Field Detail

      • position

        protected Vector position
        Blob's last center coordinate scaled into ParticlesSystem.ENGINE_X

      • delta

        protected Vector delta
        Difference between the two last blob's position

      • deltaList

        protected java.util.List<Vector> deltaList
        List of all delta values since the last call to getMouvements()

      • positionList

        protected java.util.List<Vector> positionList
        List of all positions since the last call to getMouvements()

      • force

        protected double force
        Force of this blob : use to weight delta

      • attractiveForce

        protected double attractiveForce
        Attractive Force of this blob

      • brush

        protected Brush brush
        A Brush can be attached to a blob in order to interract with environnement

      • applyForce

        protected boolean applyForce
        Force is a mode in which you can "push" something in contact with the blob (using the brush)

      • applyEraser

        protected boolean applyEraser
        Erase is a mode in which you can erase or remove something in contact with the blob (using the brush)

      • applyAttractivity

        protected boolean applyAttractivity
        Attractivity is a mode in which you can attract something in contact with the blob (using the brush)

      • toAdd

        protected int toAdd
        Add permits to add toAdd of something each time the blob appears.

      • threshold

        protected Vector threshold
        Threshold to determine if movement is significant and not to much between to iterations. Vector2(min, max)

      • Move

        Move a blob to a new position
        Parameters:
        newPosition - New blob's position

      • hasMoved

        public boolean hasMoved()
        Determine if the blob has moved by using a threshold Significant means in threshold boundaries (using threshold)
        Returns:
        true if the blob's last movements are significants, otherwise false

      • getPosition

        public Vector getPosition()
        Get current position
        Returns:
        position
        Since:
        1.0

      • getDelta

        public Vector getDelta()
        Get delta's value
        Returns:
        delta Weighted by force
        Since:
        1.0

      • getMouvements

        public java.util.List<Vector[]> getMouvements()
        List all mouvements of this blob since the last call of this method. This method helps to treat asynchronous blobs (event based). Mouvements are describes as a position (x, y) and a deplacement (deltaX, deltaY). Please note that deltas are weighted by simulation.blobForce()
        Returns:
        {..., [position(i), delta(i)], ...} for every i since last call
